name: Can you eat by yourself
description:
A challenge to age
In the face of all the troubles of age, you need to overcome these difficulties on the level of one's own efforts.

《Can you eat by yourself》 is a 3D casual game, the game is the level mode, with the challenge of the level, vertigo, hand shaking and other issues one by one, you need to overcome these difficulties, to achieve their goal by eating.

• game difficulty, achievement challenge
• fun and joy
